# College Reclaim - Lost & Found Web Application

This is a comprehensive Next.js application for college lost and found items management.

## Tech Stack
- Frontend: React + Next.js (latest)
- UI: TailwindCSS + shadcn/ui components
- State Management: React Query
- Animations: Framer Motion
- Icons: Lucide-react
- Charts: Recharts
- Backend: Next.js API routes
- Database: PostgreSQL with Prisma ORM
- Auth: NextAuth.js
- Deployment: Vercel
